item.title: [bro] Gix's Caress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Gix's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Put two +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.

• Destroy each creature with power 2 or less.

• Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control.

item.title: [bro] No One Left Behind
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [bro] Painful Quandary
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.

item.title: [bro] Powerstone Fracture
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [bro] Thran Vigil
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever one or more artifact and/or creature cards leave your graveyard during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [bro] Fallaji Chaindancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{2}: Fallaji Chaindancer gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [bro] Mishra's Onslaught
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Create two 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens.

• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [bro] Mishra's Domination
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2. Otherwise, it can't block.

item.title: [bro] Obliterating Bolt
item.description:
Sorcery

Obliterating Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswlker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [bro] Pyrrhic Blast
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Pyrrhic Blast deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target. Draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Raze to the Ground
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell can't be countered.

Destroy target artifact. If its mana value was 1 or less, draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Sibling Rivalry
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Visions of Phyrexia
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't play a card from exile this turn, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Mishra's Research Desk
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Research Desk: Exile the top two cards of your library. Choose one of them. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [bro] Fallaji Excavation
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three tapped Powerstone tokens. You gain 3 life. (The tokens are artifacts with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Epic Confrontation
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

item.title: [bro] Fog of War
item.description:
Instant

You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 3 or less.

item.title: [bro] Gaea's Gift
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains reach, trample, hexproof, and indestructible until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [bro] Obstinate Baloth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

item.title: [bro] Tawnos's Tinkering
item.description:
Instant

Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact, creature, or land you control. Untap that permanent. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.

item.title: [bro] Deathbloom Ritualist
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warlock

{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [bro] Fallaji Vanguard
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

First strike

Whenever Fallaji Vanguard or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [bro] Junkyard Genius
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Junkyard Genius etners the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

{1}{B}{R}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Until end of turn, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste.

item.title: [bro] Third Path Iconoclast
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

item.title: [bro] Tocasia, Dig Site Mentor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Creatures you control have vigilance and "{T}: Surveil 1." (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

{2}{G}{G}{W}{W}{U}{U}, Exile Tocasia, Dig Site Mentor from your graveyard: Return any number of target artifact cards with total mana value 10 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [bro] Goblin Firebomb
item.description:
Artifact

Flash

{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Firebomb: Destroy target permanent.

item.title: [bro] Liberator, Urza's Battlethopter
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Thopter

Flash

Flying

You may cast colorless spells and artifact spells as though they had flash.

Whenever you cast a spell, if the amount of mana spent to cast that spell is greater than Liberator, Urza's Battlethopter's power, put a +1/+1 counter on Liberator.

item.title: [bro] Portal to Phyrexia
item.description:
Artifact

When Portal to Phyrexia enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices three creatures.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It's a Phyrexian in addition to its other types.

item.title: [bro] The Stasis Coffin
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{2}, {T}, Exile The Stasis Coffin: You gain protection from everything until your next turn.

item.title: [bro] Su-Chi Cave Guard
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Vigilance

Ward {4} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)

When Su-Chi Cave Guard dies, add eight {C}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

item.title: [bro] Thran Power Suit
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it and has ward {2}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [bro] Tocasia's Dig Site
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Menace

At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Heavyweight Demolisher unless you pay {3}.

Unearth {6}{R}{R} ({6}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Prototype {2}{W} — 1/1 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)

Double strike

When Combat Thresher enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Whenever Terisian Mindbreaker attacks, defending player mills half their library, rounded up.

Unearth {1}{U}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
